section.p: The ShellAWSOpenStackvSphereAzure integration provides you with the following feature for controlling the execution of Shell scripts:provisioning and deprovisioning of virtual servers:provisioning and deprovisioning of virtual systems:provisioning, modification, and deprovisioning of VMs:

In the definition of the technical services for ShellAWSOpenStackvSphereAzure, you can specify the MAIL_FOR_COMPLETION parameter. This is an address to which emails are to be sent in case manual steps are required to complete an operation.

If you specify this parameter, the ShellAWSOpenStackVMwareAzure service controller interrupts the processing of each operation before its completion and waits for a notification about the execution of a manual action. This notification consists in opening the link given in the email.
Omit the MAIL_FOR_COMPLETION parameter if you do not want to interrupt the processing.
